name: Quiz Magic Academy DS - Futatsu No Jikuuseki
name_original: Quiz Magic Academy DS - Futatsu No Jikuuseki
description:
Quiz Magic Academy DS - Futatsu No Jikuuseki is an educational game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment. It was originally released in 2010. Konami published the game.
You can play Quiz Magic Academy DS - Futatsu No Jikuuseki on Nintendo DS.
